name: places/ChIJY3Kq9vz1wokRSY2yzX2yp-0
formattedAddress: 520 E 117th St, New York, NY 10035, USA
adrFormatAddress: 520 E 117th St, New York, NY 10035, USA

originalText.text:
I had my car cover stolen and got to talk to the manager about what happened.
He just doesn't care and told me that if I don't feel safe I'm free to look for another place to park my car.

I also asked him about the thefts and broken windows and he doesn't care either. I believe that in the last 2 months more than 15 cars were stolen. One of them even stole the wheels.

I don't think people are really understanding what's going on there, so I took some pictures to show you all what is really going on.

originalText.text:
This is the cheapest garage around for a reason. My car got broken into twice in two weeks, and many others are broken into on a weekly basis.

Just find a legitimate garage and save yourself the headache and repair costs.

text.text:

Just find a legitimate garage and save yourself the headache and repair costs.

originalText.text:
Massive security issues at this garage.  I had noticed some broken glass on the ground more frequently, assuming it was a few one-offs.

The it finally happened to me.  Whoever was in the office told me, "you have insurance?  They should be able to pay.", which was very reassuring when I had to drive on a cold night in January!  Security was useless as well, although considering the amount of crime in that garage, not a surprise.

When the police came they told me they've had a lot of calls from that garage lately, so either management doesn't care, or they're actively choosing to let this happen.  Conveniently, no security cameras on the floors they have monthly parkers use.

Do yourself a favor and don't park here.

originalText.text: Security issues in this garage. My friend's car was wrecked! it happens every day. The policeman said he comes here all the time. The administration of the parking lot does nothing about it. Please send an email and wait for a response. There are no cameras or security in this place. it is safer to leave the car on the street near the house. While we were writing the protocol, I counted 5 cars with a broken window in only one place, where there were 20 cars. You will not receive any discount from the insurance company if you replace the glasses yourself. Also from the parking there is no discount and compensation for damage.

originalText.text:
Moved my car from this garage after reading several reviews... walked around... lots of broken glass all over the ground in many many places and many broken back windows if you look closely at the cars… what a racket

Now please respond with:

Thank you for your review. We will share this with the local management team.

Thank you,
SP+
